original_text: And coming up at that very hour she began to give thanks to God and to speak of him to all who were waiting for the redemption of Jerusalem.
korean_text: 마침 이 때에 나아와서 하나님께 감사하고 예루살렘의 속량을 바라는 모든 사람에게 그에 대하여 말하니라

sentences.original_text: And coming up at that very hour
she began to give thanks to God
and to speak of him to all
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그분에 대해 모든 사람에게 말하며

sentences.original_text: who were waiting for the redemption of Jerusalem.
